pullrequest.title: allows urdf parser to parse visual plugins

content.raw:
Example syntax is below:

```
#!xml

<gazebo reference="my_link">
  <visual>
    ... SDF blobs (including plugins) ...
  </visual>
</gazebo>
```
content.html:
Example syntax is below:

<gazebo reference="my_link">
  <visual>
    ... SDF blobs (including plugins) ...
  </visual>
</gazebo>

pullrequest.title: allows urdf parser to parse visual plugins

content.raw:
@piyushk Sorry for the delay in reviewing this pull request. We are actually moving the parser_urdf code out of gazebo and into the [sdformat package](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat). We're in the middle of the transition now, testing with gazebo-prerelease debs. So can you make this pull request against the sdformat repository?

Thanks.
content.html:
@piyushk Sorry for the delay in reviewing this pull request. We are actually moving the parser_urdf code out of gazebo and into the sdformat package. We're in the middle of the transition now, testing with gazebo-prerelease debs. So can you make this pull request against the sdformat repository?

Thanks.

pullrequest.title: allows urdf parser to parse visual plugins

content.raw: @scpeters Absolutely. I am currently building against a custom gazebo build because of this very patch. I'll need to update to gazebo-prerelease and reapply the patch.
content.html: @scpeters Absolutely. I am currently building against a custom gazebo build because of this very patch. I'll need to update to gazebo-prerelease and reapply the patch.

content.raw: I've [documented](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Tutorials/1.9/Installing_gazebo_ros_Packages#Install_From_Source) how to build from source the gazebo-prerelease
content.html: I've documented how to build from source the gazebo-prerelease

pullrequest.title: allows urdf parser to parse visual plugins

content.raw:
sdformat pull request: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/21/patch-to-allow-parser_urdf-to-parse-visual/diff

@scpeters I did notice a few inconsistencies in both the `gazebo_1.9` and `sdf_external` branches of gazebo which still contain outdated references to `sdf/sdf.hh`. [Here](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/ffcb51151937f3e8a4a255c4ebd9c8d467da9a3c/gazebo/rendering/Visual.hh?at=gazebo_1.9) is one instance. Both branches compile, but my visual plugin fails to do so. I assume that this is because things are still in midst of a transition. Let me know if I should report it as a bug.
content.html:
sdformat pull request: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/21/patch-to-allow-parser_urdf-to-parse-visual/diff

@scpeters I did notice a few inconsistencies in both the gazebo_1.9 and sdf_external branches of gazebo which still contain outdated references to sdf/sdf.hh. Here is one instance. Both branches compile, but my visual plugin fails to do so. I assume that this is because things are still in midst of a transition. Let me know if I should report it as a bug.

pullrequest.title: allows urdf parser to parse visual plugins

content.raw: We've changed the package and library names from sdf to sdformat to avoid name conflicts in ubuntu, but we haven't changed the source code (file names, class names, namespaces, etc.). We don't have an issue filed yet for this. Please feel free to file a bug. Thanks.
content.html: We've changed the package and library names from sdf to sdformat to avoid name conflicts in ubuntu, but we haven't changed the source code (file names, class names, namespaces, etc.). We don't have an issue filed yet for this. Please feel free to file a bug. Thanks.
